scripts.build: openapi bundle -o dist/satisfactory-oas.yaml && openapi build-docs dist/satisfactory-oas.yaml -o dist/satisfactory-oas.html
scripts.scalar: openapi bundle -o dist/satisfactory-oas.yaml && openapi build-docs dist/satisfactory-oas.yaml -o dist/satisfactory-oas.html && scalar serve dist/satisfactory-oas.yaml
